title: BestOf
itunes:title: BestOf
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's NBA Playoff action. Would you take the Grizzlies against Golden State at this point? Former ESPN President John Skipper explains why he wouldn't have given Tom Brady all that money to be an analyst. And Steve Sands explains what Greg Norman is doing with the Saudi backed golf league. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
